text: Cercosaura hypnoides is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Colombia. ==References== Category:Cercosaura Category:Reptiles of Colombia Category:Endemic fauna of Colombia Category:Reptiles described in 2012 Category:Taxa named by Tiffany M. Doan Category:Taxa named by William W. Lamar
title: Cercosaura hypnoides
